meta.title: From PUZZLE to FACTORY
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: In 2023, teammate's hunt started with a round of puzzles supposedly written by AI. Soon we revealed a hidden [Puzzle Factory](https://puzzles.mit.edu/2023/), full of rejected, chaotic AIs, whose puzzle-writing was … a bit erratic. Teams were tasked with fixing up the factory. TTBNL found the coin and won the hunt.

ladder.clue: Profession who would own and use a <>
<> {}s, insect genus that includes over 1000 species
Relation that sounds like "<>", to some
Reverse <> and add a letter to get a 20th century TV show
Change one letter in <> to get a kind of tag
{} <> has been eight years old for almost eighty years
